review: I had just got back home in Bangalore after a bike trip from Hyderabad. I was perfectly alright and went to sleep by around 2:30 am at around 3:30 am I had a discomfort in my chest and went to the washroom. I collapsed there only to regain consciousness after a good 10 min Or so. Knowing this was not a good sign I rushed to the nearby hospital and got admitted. I was told I would need to be referred to another hospital as the Dr ( Dr Mukul) is on leave from the next day. I told them I am not sure if I will make it if they do that. Dr Mukul wad informed and he decided to cancel his leave and come down(I still admire him for his dedication). In about half an hour I meet this young Dr who had taken the control of the OT and was proceeding to get an angeoplasty on me. The curious me kept asking him doubts and he snubbed me in a very friendly *** ****** * ** **** ****** ***** ****** **** *** *** there on the operation table after that friendly banter I was laughing even while fighting to survive. He is the sweetest Dr I have met so far who built a very cordial relationship with me post treatment. He took out the time to sit and hear through all my problems something he could have easily avoided. My heart attack happened just three days before my birthday so i made sure to cut my bday cake with him in the hospital üòä guess now over the period of three months we have matured to being good friends than being just a Dr for a patient! Definitely recommend him for heart ailments if you wish to have a personal touch to your treatment. Wish him all the very best.

I had a sudden discomfort at midnight. No typical symptoms that could corelate to a heart condition, however, a restlessness that I was not able to withstand. I rushed to the CMH hospital , that is closest from my place. Got admitted and was stable by early morning. Dr M R Fulmali was my assigned consultant cardiologist. I had no reference of his name or any research on the web. Also since I was not having any severe symptoms, I was a skeptic whether I indeed had a cardiac event , having heard tons of stories of corporate hospitals.
Dr Fulmali, spoke to me exactly 4 sentences when he saw me and infact the very first one he talked to me , got me hooked on. 
" You may choose to be in a state of denial or accept the fact that you have a cardiac event. Though stabilized now, medicinal intervention has got you the stability so as a true friend and consultant I will advice you to get an angiogram asap and decide the further course of action. I will be the first person to allow you to go if the angiogram clears the doubts". This set the record straight. I then agreed to angiography and went thru angioplasty and understood how timely the advice was. 
I truly appreciate Dr Fulmali's consultation on multiple grounds
- Very open and direct communication with clarity of positives and negatives.
- clarity of urgency or how to approach if not urgent
- he was very empathetic to the family members and agreed to discussions with them , wants the patient to be convinced rather than accept under ambiguity. He made my family more comfortable before I agreed to the procedure.
- Was very confident and took the pressure away of the procedure from me with the dialogue.
- The sense of commitment as he establishes into the ranks of the best of cardiologists, were evident thru all the interactions.

I will recommend Dr Fulmali for a trusted consultation

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I am 67yrs n i was suffering  on 23rd December with high  b.p n sugar levels went really high n cholesterol n had a minor problem in kidney and lungs too n a minor heart attack too n i was admitted to c.m.h hospital in c.c.u n Dr. Mukul  was handling my case n he had diagnosed all this as i mentioned before n it was a very serious problem but he gave medicines n n treated me in the c.c.u n Dr  n his team took best care hats off  n treatment done under Dr mukul n his team in the c.c.u  wouldn't  have been done better than doctor mukul was extremely excellent üëåüëå n helpful n friendly n humble n caring  n he took so good care of me as a family member n he is the best doctor n he will advise you what is best for you n your health n he doesn't give any unnecessary advice or information he is well experienced and skilled hats off to Dr.Mukul .I want to tell people in this world that he will advise n help you all in the best way n will save your life's ahead to live peacefully  n a very Big thank you from ur paitent  (sutendar kumar sharma) i am fine now n Dr. Mukul takes good care of his paitents health always he is the best doctor recommended n he is very co operative n he is best at his work always n very attentive n very quick response n Dr is very friendly with paitent doesn't let me feel that I had so many problems but made me feel better n made me get better day by day n  always n fine too n that is the best about Dr mukul very good üëç

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Hypertension Treatment,Cardiac Diseases,BP Monitoring, Echo (pediatric & adult) ,
review:
Great doctor n friendly n great staff under the doctor n very helpful n very clean ccu n very soft spoken doctor n they take care of your patient very well n helped the patient whenever required especially the ccu cardiology dr.mukul has saved my dad (he had high bp n high sugar levels n breathlessness n uneasyness n sivere head ache n mild heartattack)while admitting him n they have guided n survived him n made him back to normal n they don't panic the patient at all n help the patient even after discharge or being in other ward too n very attentive n very sincere n very accurate in the process of medicine n tests n medical need for the paitent thank you so much all the staff n nurse n all the cleaning staff too means a lot for us hats off great job god has given you the best work of saving people's lives üôè proud of you doctor Mukul R Fulmali sir Big thank you from my family n always will be great ful by your duties n care you take Dr.Mukul R Fulmali
No extra charges taken very good hospital CMH hospital indiranagar Bangalore

It was 14th April 2022, my brother was sweating and in sometime his body became cold, we rushed to nearby Prakriya hospital. He was diagnosed with 70% blockage in artery.Dr Mukul gave confidence regarding the angioplasty,we were convinced but still worried, in 30min he was operated successfully and was shifted to ICU ward.He recovered in one day and he was stable.

Dr.Mukul is a spiritual doctor, patient will get immense confidence by his words. Believe me God works through him. Heartily I thank Dr Mukul for giving another rebirth to my brother.

For today it is more than 3 months, my brother is doing well with his routine life.

Visited for my mother in law's consultation for high BP. Doctor didnt want to listen to what we were trying to explain and kept speaking non stop about the impact of BP including heart attack in front of the patient. Definitely lacks interpersonal skills and compassion in this regard.  He was just eager to start medication and nothing else! Didnt even both to explain the ECHO and ECG report. We finally consulted another cardiologist in a different hospital to get a good feedback. Definitely can be avoided..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
Dr. Mukul made my grandmother very comfortable during her angiogram and helped manage the situation best keeping the hospital and the families interest at mind. 
The family was humbled with his approach. Thank you team for such a quick and thorough response :)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr. Mukul Fulmali @ Chimaya Hrudaylaya treated my father for severe chest pain. The Dr. correctly breifed us about the situation and then perfomed the sugery . The Father has recovered quite well . He is approchable and good natured. We liked the frankness of the doctor and the care towards patients. Overall we had a good experience.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Dr. Mukul Ramachandra Fulmali cardiologist at Chinmaya Hrudayalaya Bangalore treated my mother (covid positive) for her Cardiac attack. Due to Dr. MUKUL efforts my mother recovered quickly. I am great full to him and his entire team.

Once Martin H. Fischer said: "Observation, Reason, Human Understanding, Courage; these make the physician." And it stand true for Dr Mukul Ramachandra Fulmali...

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
I visited Dr Mukul in emergency for my househelp,she had sudden chest pain.
Dr Mukul reached within 30 min by the time emergency treatment was given and he performed angiogram followed by angioplasty.
He explained very well about the disease and the procedure and was very friendly during the further course of treatment.
He helped her in all possible ways.
Really appreciate his gesture.
Must say he is very skilled in his field, friendly and a nice human being.
